commentMessage: This article has projected the Time series analysis in very complex way & it is only understandable by Data scientist who have some hands-on experience. Time-Series could have been easily explained i.e converting Non-stationary time series data set to stationary by using differencing concept, and then how ACF & PACF plot can be used for passing into ARIMA, to get relevant forecast.
I believe the ACF where the formula: gamma(k)/gamma(0) is presented is the Autocorrelation function not Autocovariance function.
